name: Event Sponsorship Packages
description: Design and customize sponsorship packages to attract ideal sponsors for your event.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Develop event sponsorship packages for event{{event_name}} with [package details] {{target_sponsors}} {{goals}} {{benefits}}

goals.title: Event Sponsorship Goals
goals.description: What you hope to achieve through sponsorships (e.g., raise event funding, increase brand exposure for sponsors,..)

ui_metadata.value: Raise funds to cover event costs (venue rental, equipment, refreshments) Increase brand exposure for sponsors amongst our target audience Secure in-kind sponsorships (e.g., software licenses, equipment rentals) to enhance the workshop experience

benefits.title: Event Benefits
benefits.description: A list of the benefits you can offer potential sponsors (e.g., logo placement on marketing materials, speaking opportunities, booth space at the event..)

ui_metadata.value: Logo placement on all event marketing materials (website, social media, email blasts) Company name and logo listed in the event program Acknowledgement as a sponsor during opening remarks

target_sponsors.title: Target Sponsors
target_sponsors.description: The type of companies or organizations you want to attract as sponsors (e.g., industry leaders, startups, local businesses).

ui_metadata.value: Music software companies: Develop brand awareness and generate leads among aspiring music producers. Music equipment manufacturers: Showcase audio interfaces, microphones, and other recording gear. Online music distribution platforms: Highlight services for independent musicians to distribute their music. Local music stores: Generate interest in music production products and services offered at their stores. Educational institutions: Promote music production programs and attract potential students.
